code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';const useLocalStorage=(key,initialValue)=>{const[value,setValue]=useState(()=>{try{const storedValue=localStorage.getItem(key);return storedValue?JSON.parse(storedValue):initialValue;}catch(error){console.error("Error reading from localStorage:",error);return initialValue;}});useEffect(()=>{try{localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(value));}catch(error){console.error("Error saving to localStorage:",error);}},[key,value]);return[value,setValue];};export default useLocalStorage;
